title: [置頂] 誰還未覺醒  設置為手機鈴聲 同我今日較度大大聲

replies.msg:
以前成日有人問點解冇人用手機鈴聲。

對於我而言，因為係唔想騷擾人。

但係今日就係大家真係唔好唔好吵親人

小弟剪左影片一段部分作為檔案，但係唔知點樣po出黎。

因此要教你地點樣自己cut，如果有巴打絲打可以直接po link比人down，歡迎留言。

1. 打開Youtube，搜尋: 孩子問：誰還未覺醒
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=RNbXLbHrMds

歌詞:
試問誰還未發聲
都捨我其誰衛我城
天生有權還有心可作主
誰要認命噤聲
試問誰能未覺醒
聽真那自由在奏鳴
激起再難違背的那份良知和應

為何美夢仍是個夢 還想等恩賜泡影
為這黑與白這非與是 真與偽來做證
為這世代有未來 要及時擦亮眼睛

無人有權沉默 看著萬家燈火變了色
問我心再用我手 去為選我命途力拼
人既是人 有責任有自由決定遠景

2. copy and paste link

https://www.onlinevideoconverter.com/en

convert a video link -> paste link -> format .mp3

more setting -> Audio Quality 自選 ->

Convert from (v) start of video ->禁一下變 00:00:00 -> 00:00:22

Convert to (v) end of video -> 禁一下變 00:00:00 ->自選 (個人建議00:01:56，由於其後停頓過長)

3. 由於上述網站只為粗略剪輯，會令部分完美主義者不滿意開頭音樂有違和感

可自行選擇於https://audiotrimmer.com/

上傳檔案并進行微調

本人建議經上述粗略剪輯後 -> Crop from (seconds) :1.13 to 自選

記得記得唔好吵親人



另外有 Do you hear the people sing? 比大家欣賞，人地點樣由少人，細細聲開始

真係唔好吵到人

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=47E2tfK5QAg
lyrics: Do you hear the people sing?
Singing the songs of angry men?
It is the music of the people
Who will not be slaves again!
When the beating of your heart
Echoes the beating of the drums
There is a life about to start
When tomorrow comes!
Will you join in our crusade?
Who will be strong and stand with me?
Somewhere beyond the barricade
Is there a world you long to see?
Then join in the fight
That will give you the right to be free!
Do you hear the people sing?
Singing the songs of angry men?
It is the music of the people
Who will not be slaves again!
When the beating of your heart
Echoes the beating of the drums
There is a life about to start
When tomorrow comes!
Will you give all you can give
So that our banner may advance
Some will fall and some will live
Will you stand up and take your chance?
The blood of the martyrs
Will water the meadows of France!
Do you hear the people sing?
Singing the songs of angry men?
It is the music of the people
Who will not be slaves again!
When the beating of your heart
Echoes the beating of the drums
There is a life about to start
When tomorrow comes

請置頂

此刻，我們都係香港人

If you want peace, prepare for war.
哩個係和理非非嘅武器，唱度777同克警跪底。
